title: （1.6.2）老外的半条命MOD，你惊呆了么？
txt_content:
本帖最后由 4072 于 2013-9-2 19:58 编辑 

简介为原地址英文：
This mod uses 64x64 textures. (Guns dont look so good in 16x16 textures). I will add an option to change the resolution soon!


If you dont know how to install the mod then go on youtube and search it up because the way to install mods has changed and its more complex now!


If you make a mod review send me the link so i can post it here!!


This mod was started by falkok15 and is being continued by me. 
作者（或搬运者）：这个MOD安装方法将更加复杂。意思我不懂，我是不会装、而且作者介绍过于简短，连物品都没介绍......（比天朝人的弱多了......）
能下么？


求高手研究安装方法的说{:10_513:}
